com.mumfrey.liteloader.permissions

Interface PermissionsManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PermissionsManagerClient, PermissionsManagerServer

    public interface PermissionsManager
    Interface for permissions manager implementations
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Permissions getPermissions(Permissible mod)
      Get the underlying permissions node for this manager for the specified mod
      java.lang.Long getPermissionUpdateTime(Permissible mod)
      Get the time the permissions for the specified mod were last updated
      void onTick(GameEngine<?,?> engine, float partialTicks, boolean inGame)
      Handler for tick event
      void registerPermissible(Permissible permissible)
      Register a new event listener, the registered object will receive callbacks for permissions events
      void tamperCheck()
      Perform any necessary validation to check for a tamper condition, can and should be called from as many places as possible

        Timestamp when the permissions were last updated
